seller.shipping:
[b]<PAYMENT METHOD>[/b]
I accept PAYPAL only.
Please pay within 5 days after the auction has ended.

[b]<SHIPPING & HANDLING COST>[/b]
All items are shipped from Japan.
In accordance with the rules of PayPal, I send all parcels to the address enrolled in PayPal.
If you want me to send the different address, please change the enrolled address in PayPal and then pay the money.
Unless you agree with this, please don't bid for my items.
